alert.note: Alert for Chemung; Schuyler; Steuben; Tompkins (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 21 at 9:19PM EST until January 23 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM SUNDAY TO 7 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Steuben, Schuyler, Chemung and Tompkins counties. * WHEN...From 3 PM Sunday to 7 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures will be in the upper 20s to mid 30s through the event making for a heavy wet snow, especially in the valleys. Snowfall rates up to 1 inch per hour could occur for a short period of time.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
